Name: Uzak Diyar Destanlar覺 1: Remastered
About the game: Remastered Edition Ready for some nostalgia? Epics of Distant Realm is an adventure game from 2006, combined with role-playing elements. Take control of a young man who has lost his memory upon crashing to a foreign world. Explore the island, clear dungeons, find loot, buy a farm and grow tomatoes. Your call. Remaster Features: Overhaul of backgrounds, while keeping the feel of the authentic look Hero movement and animation is now realistic Replacing arrow controls with the modern WASD scheme Replacing map system with the new navigation screen Introduction of hotkeys to make selections easier Rebalancing of enemies corresponding to your level stats Improved HUD and all the text Improved dialogue with slightly better humor Bug fixes New Features: New levels and interactions to explore NEW GAME+ mode to increase replay value
